properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; Fulton, KY; Hickman, KY; Alexander, IL; Carlisle, KY; Ballard, KY; Pulaski, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 19 at 8:03PM CST until January 29 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois and Kentucky...

Ohio River at Shawneetown...Paducah...Olmsted Dam...and Cairo

.The Ohio River will remain nearly steady or even rise a few tenths
over the next few days. After that...it will begin a slow fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Cairo.
* until Wednesday January 29.
* At  7:00 PM Sunday the stage was 48.7 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is currently cresting near 48.7 feet, and it
will remain nearly steady through Tuesday. After that, it will
begin to fall, but will remain above flood stage for at least
another week.
* Impact...At 50.0 Feet...The first gate is closed at Cairo.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
